content.text: Match ends, Real Madrid 3, Espanyol 0.
Second Half ends, Real Madrid 3, Espanyol 0.
Attempt missed. Javi López (Espanyol) left footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Javi Chica.
Corner,  Espanyol. Conceded by Marcelo.
Attempt saved. Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Lass Diarra.
Second yellow card to Juan Forlín (Espanyol).
Goal!  Real Madrid 3, Espanyol 0. Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Lass Diarra.
Attempt missed. Manuel Molina (Espanyol) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Luis García following a set piece situation.
Substitution, Espanyol. Javi López replaces José Callejón.
